reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Assessing the potential of biomass energy as part of Mexico's energy mix in support of a low carbon economy

description.narrative: The project will assess potential cases for biomass energy production of new and existing processes in order to replace fossil fuels in Mexico, supporting the Ministry of Energy's development goals. It will identify potential synergies with UK and open opportunities for international companies with expertise and technology in this area to work in Mexico.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
